subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Shaun Marcum won for the first time in four starts, Gregg Zaun hit a two-run homer and the Toronto Blue Jays beat visiting Kansas City, 7-2.
snippet: Shaun Marcum won for the first time in four starts, Gregg Zaun hit a two-run homer and the Toronto Blue Jays beat visiting Kansas City, 7-2.
